thread.section_title: LendingTree Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LendingTree | www.lendingtree.com | 5 of 240
thread.title: Jacqueline Allen

author: Jacqueline Allen
title: Jacqueline Allen
text: Once I decided that I wanted to buy a house I applied to lending tree for a mortgage. They sent me a few different offers and I talked to a couple of different people and chose one of the lenders. I had my preapproval within a couple of days and had bought a house in another state within about 7 to 8 weeks. I was very pleased with the complete transaction.
